mapper.sql: id, device_id deviceId, image, result_image resultImage, result, `time`
mapper.select: SELECT s.id,s.device_id,s.image,s.result_image,s.result,s.time FROM sys_insect_rec s LEFT JOIN sys_insect_device b ON s.device_id=b.imei WHERE b.site_id = #{site_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY ABS( NOW( ) - s.time ) ASC LIMIT 1
